mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_puuid AS menu_puuid, m.menu_uuid AS menu_uuid, m.menu_name AS menu_name, m.menu_url AS menu_url, m.menu_icon AS menu_icon, m.menu_sort AS menu_sort, m.menu_ctrl AS menu_ctrl, m.menu_hide AS menu_hide FROM ht_admin_menu m WHERE m.menu_puuid = '0' and m.del_flag='0' ORDER BY m.menu_sort ASC

select m.menu_uuid AS menu_uuid, m.menu_name AS menu_name, m.menu_url AS menu_url, m.menu_icon AS menu_icon, m.menu_sort AS menu_sort, m.menu_ctrl AS menu_ctrl, m.menu_hide AS menu_hide from ht_admin_menu m WHERE m.menu_puuid =#{menu_uuid} and m.del_flag = '0'

SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_puuid AS menu_puuid, m.menu_uuid AS menu_uuid, m.menu_name AS menu_name, m.menu_url AS menu_url, m.menu_icon AS menu_icon, m.menu_sort AS menu_sort FROM ht_admin a INNER JOIN ht_admin_and_role anr ON a.id = anr.user_id INNER JOIN ht_admin_role ar ON anr.role_id = ar.id AND ar.del_flag = '0' AND ar.status='0' INNER JOIN ht_admin_role_menu_permissions mp ON anr.role_id = mp.role_id AND mp.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN ht_admin_menu m ON mp.menu_uuid = m.menu_uuid AND m.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN ht_admin_permissions p ON p.permission_uuid = mp.permission_uuid AND p.del_flag = '0' AND m.menu_hide = '0' WHERE a.id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND p.permission = #{permission, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND m.menu_hide = '0' AND a.state = '0' AND a.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY m.menu_sort ASC

SELECT CASE WHEN m.menu_ctrl IS NULL OR m.menu_ctrl = '' THEN m.menu_uuid ELSE m.menu_ctrl END AS menu_ctrl, p.permission FROM ht_admin a INNER JOIN ht_admin_and_role anr ON a.id = anr.user_id INNER JOIN ht_admin_role ar ON anr.role_id = ar.id and ar.status = '0' AND ar.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN ht_admin_role_menu_permissions mp ON anr.role_id = mp.role_id AND mp.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN ht_admin_menu_permssions amp on amp.menu_id=mp.menu_uuid and amp.permission_id=mp.permission_uuid INNER JOIN ht_admin_menu m ON amp.menu_id = m.menu_uuid AND m.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN ht_admin_permissions p ON p.permission_uuid = mp.permission_uuid AND p.del_flag = '0' WHERE a.id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.state = '0' AND a.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY m.menu_ctrl collate utf8_bin
SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.username, a.truename, anr.role_id, a.state FROM ht_admin a LEFT JOIN ht_admin_and_role anr ON a.id = anr.user_id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.del_flag = '0'
SELECT * FROM ht_admin a WHERE username = #{username}
